question: Psoriasis is associated with which of the following factors?

answers.option: Binding to ergosterol and pore formation

question: A girl had a 3x3 cm tumour on her nose which was successfully excised during a medical procedure. What plastic surgery options should be considered to address the cosmetic and functional aspects of her nose following the tumor excision?

They are at a specific locus
Both of the alleles at a locus are different
Both of the alleles at a locus are same

question: Which of the following procedures is a cosmetic procedure for the eyelids?

A 22-year-old female presented to the emergency department after suffering a burn injury. On examination, a 20 x 20 cm burn on the scalp area was noted along with the exposure of the skull cap. Which of the following is the most appropriate management for covering the defect in this patient?

A 42-year-old female presents to the dermatology clinic with complaints of itching on her elbows and knees for the past two days. Her past medical record is significant for celiac disease which was diagnosed 1 year ago. On examination, grouped erythematous vesicles are appreciated on elbows and knees. Direct immunofluorescence of the skin biopsy is likely to show which of the following?

answers.option: Deposits of IgG at the tip of dermal pappilae
A fishnet pattern of immunoglobulin deposition along with suprabasal acantholysis
Deposition of immunoglobulin along the plasma membrane of the keratinocyte
Linear deposition of the complement at the dermoepidermal junction
Deposits of IgA at the tip of dermal papillae

answers.option: Inhibition of aminoacyl transfer RNA synthetase

question: Which of the following statements regarding the side effects of amphotericin B is the correct one?

answers.option: It has dose dependent renal toxicity
Lipid formulation of the drug reduces some toxicity
Intravenous form can cause decrease in temperature
Intravenous form can cause shock like decrease in blood pressure

It will likely resolve on its own
Immunosuppresants are the first treatment of choice

answers.option: Prevalence of disease increases in a population

question: Which of the following is a criterion for X-linked recessive inheritance?

answers.option: Two inherited mutant alleles required for an individual to be affected
